settings.heading: More Than a Brand, A 30-Year Legacy
settings.subheading: Our story begins in 1993. For over two decades, we were the hidden champions of the global fitness industry.

settings.heading: From Hidden Champions to Industry Leaders
settings.text:
As Omni Group, we designed and manufactured products for the world's most renowned fitness brands. We mastered core technologies and secured over 50 global patents. We set industry standards, and our products filled the aisles of Dick's Sporting Goods, ALDI, and Lidl.

We know what true quality means.

settings.label: Our Philosophy
settings.heading: Fitness is a Right, Not a Privilege
settings.text:
"Start Where You Are."

This is more than our slogan; it's the core of everything we do. We believe there are infinite paths to wellness, and the most crucial step is the first one.

settings.title: Designed for Real Life
settings.text: Every product is engineered to solve real-world problems: saving space, ensuring ease of use, and guaranteeing durability. Smart industrial design meets functionality.

settings.title: Excellence Within Reach
settings.text: Leveraging our powerful supply chain, we deliver premium quality at competitive prices. Top-tier quality without the top-tier price tag.

settings.title: Embracing Every Possibility
settings.text: Our three-color systemâ€”Orange (Strength), Green (Endurance), Purple (Flexibility)â€”encourages you to explore what moves you and find pure joy in fitness.

settings.mission_heading: Built Different. Built Better. Built for You.

settings.heading: Your Most Trusted Partner in Wellness
settings.text:
Choosing Ativafit means choosing a trusted partner with a 30-year history.

Innovation: From our patented Dial Tech system to AI-driven training with Ativafit.AI

Quality: Built to standards tested by the world's most demanding retailers

Support: We're here every step of the way, celebrating every milestone

settings.heading: Grow With Us: Become Our Partner
settings.text:
Today, Ativafit's business footprint covers key markets including China, North America, and Europe. We're not only a direct-to-consumer brand but also a world-class B2B partner.

We offer: Market-proven products, stable supply chain, robust brand support, and flexible partnership models.

settings.label: Ready to Transform?
settings.heading: Join us. Let's create the future together.
settings.text: Whether you're starting your fitness journey or looking to elevate your game, Ativafit is here to power your potential.
